Source.Name: dmg2img
Source.Summary: Program that lets you convert .dmg files to .img files
Source.Description: DMG2IMG is a tool which allows converting Apple compressed dmg archives to standard (hfsplus) image disk files. Just go to the folder where the .dmg file is located cd PATH/TO/THE/FILE and then convert it by doing dmg2img NAMEOFTHEFILE.dmg NAMEOFTHEFILE.img

Package.Name: dmg2img
Package.Summary: Program that lets you convert .dmg files to .img files
Package.Description: DMG2IMG is a tool which allows converting Apple compressed dmg archives to standard (hfsplus) image disk files. Just go to the folder where the .dmg file is located cd PATH/TO/THE/FILE and then convert it by doing dmg2img NAMEOFTHEFILE.dmg NAMEOFTHEFILE.img
